column4: hi - i have a question - if i copy all my data to my 2nd HD, can ubuntu remember permissions setup prior to reinstallation?
if you use the right tool to copy them
I'm not really sure.. (or I would have told you), I just know that there are tools that preserve permissions and there are tools that don't
Mpole: there is an offtopic channel.. let's try to keep this channel for support only
